summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 FORD FOCUS. WHILE DRIVING 40 MPH, THE VEHICLE LOST POWER AND THE "SERVICE ENGINE FAULT NOW" MESSAGE WAS DISPLAYED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO CENTURY FORD OF MOUNT AIRY (302 CENTURY DR, MT AIRY, MD 21771, (833) 214-7277) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TURBO BYPASS VALVE NEEDED TO BE REPAIRED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE VACUUM PUMP NEEDED TO BE REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 67,995.
